question: This cab service made an agreement with Bajaj Allianz to offer a comprehensive insurance programme for its driver partners.
explanation: Online cab aggregator, Ola entered into an agreement with Bajaj Allianz to offer a comprehensive insurance programme for its driver partners. This programme has been named 'Chalo Befikar'. Under this programme, Ola's driver partners can avail an insurance cover of up to Rs 5 lakh.
